title: Petition to establish or terminate a milk shed
context: PART IV. ESTABLISHMENT OF A MILK SHED AND THE SETTING OF MINIMUM PRICES AND QUOTAS Note Part heading amended by L 1971, c 184, ยง4. ยง157-30 Petition to establish or terminate a milk shed. Upon petition by fifty-five per cent of all producers and producer-distributors, or by fifty-five per cent of all producers in a prospective milk shed, or upon the board&rsquo;s own motion, the board shall hold a public hearing to establish or terminate a milk shed in a county comprising one island or on one or more islands or a portion of an island comprising a county. [L 1971, c 184, pt of ยง4; ree L 1972, c 40, pt of ยง2]
